CS:S was a game that my brother told so much about when around me, yet I didn't really have the time to play. Thanks to the steam winter sale I have granted myself a long wish to get the well recomended FPS, and it dosen't let you down. Even for the less skilled player the game will still seem to be as fun as any other, as 'most' of the servers that one plays on there will be a funny person that has the mindset of a child screaming, "I screwed your mother!" later that leads to another person retaliating leaving everyone with something to laugh at. However as I strongly agree that one shouldn't have a cry over little things, CS:S is a good way to release stress coming through the day as you mow down the tall grass known as 'the noob'. CS:S will give you something to remember and is a game that may see the stretch of time. (Or the next few years.)

9/10

Берите эту игру и вы прольете слезу ностальгии )

The best installment of the most competitive series out there, Counter-Strike: Source delivers amazing gameplay and immense replay value. The best FPS available. If you don't like the default (known as vanilla) gamemodes, there are thousands of mini-games to choose from. The hands-down best FPS is not only the best FPS, it's the best in terms of variety.
You'll be able to play this for years and years and years. One of the only truly timeless games.

контра для тех кто уверен решает скилл 
а кто думает что контра гавно тот полный ....

A magnifiscent port to the source engine! CSS brings strategy and skill together to bring you the excitement of a real counter-terrorist scenario all in one game. Still css is known as the #1 moddable/skinnable game in the world, with over thousands of skins to choose from and several awesome mods including deathrun, zombie, and deathmatch mod. You will always find yourself "to say" knee deep in fun as you play with other competative players around the world and play the fun mods. "personal favorites: zombie and jailbreak mods". CSS has certainly left its mark in gaming history!

Obama had reformed the elite group Feel Team Six to track down and kill Barracka Bin Bama that had recently assassinated The President's dog (Dog's name here because im too lazy to look that shit up). Feel Team Six embarks on a journey all across Iraq, and Afghanistan to find the assassin Barrack Bin Bama. The search soon ends when Feel Team Six discovers Bin Bama has fled to the wasteland Australia otherwise known has "Nope land". At that point Feel Team Six had realized that Bin Bama had literally entered hell and decided to launch several nuclear strikes against the country because "That place is worse than hell...and have you ever been kicked by a kangaroo? That's right, because everyone who has is dead!" With the nukes Feel Team Six had effectively killed an estimated 23.3 million people. Feel Team Six could only assume Bin Bama had died in the nuclear blast and called it a day.

I used to play this game alot when I was younger on my old account (Before my friend got me banned). And I had maybe 400-500 hours on it, which you can tell I enjoyed it very much. This was the game that started my gaming career and I must say I am thankful to Valve for giving the gift of gaming to me. I highly recommend this game to both experienced and new players.

9/10
